text: Behind Bonn's slogan of German self-determination is the intention to impose on East Germany the regime existing in West Germany. REFUGEES are pouring out of East Germany into West Berlin faster than ever. Mr. K's latest speech scared 1,157 East Germans to cross into West Berlin's reception centre DURING MONDAY NIGHT. And officials expect the total to leap to 3,000 a day.
